game.name: Five Nights In Saransk
game.genres: 액션, 어드벤처, 캐주얼, 인디, RPG, 시뮬레이션
game.shortDescription: You wake up in the middle of the night in your cozy one-room apartment and notice something wandering around your five-story panel building. Your only task is to prevent these strange creatures from getting inside.
game.shortDescriptionEn: You wake up in the middle of the night in your cozy one-room apartment and notice something wandering around your five-story panel building. Your only task is to prevent these strange creatures from getting inside.
